channel.title: Saif Ali Khan
channel.description: Recent content on Saif Ali Khan

item.title: How Techie Am I?
item.description: I usually code on anything I can, but my laptop is my go-to companion. I also have a personal computer, but I use it only for gaming.

item.title: Smart Contact Manager
item.description: A contact manager written in [Java + SpringBoot] - (backend), [HTML, CSS, JS, Flowbite, Thymeleaf, TailwindCSS] - (frontend), [MySQL] - (Database).

item.title: How I take and sync my notes
item.description: A guide to syncing your notes or files across different devices using Obsidian.

item.title: mathJX
item.description: A mathematical library written in Java, that will cover topics from middle school (Prime Numbers, Algebra, Mensuration, Logarithms) to topics that are taught in college (Newton Rapshon, Euler, Range Kutta)
